webscript.shortname: Get list of records management roles and their details, for a file plan.
webscript.description:
The file plan should be specified in the URL parmeters. If not the default file plan will be used.
Parameters: store_type, store_id, id - file plan node reference siteid - id of a RM site to take the file plan from user - only returns roles that this user is assigned to auths - if true, returns details of authorites directly assigned to the role. false by default. is - if true includes system roles in the results, otherwise excludes them. false by default.
